notes: values 1-3 are were taken from individuals where biomass of terminal meter of stem was also harvested (see biomass dataset), while 'x' is used for additional individuals

description: location of sample. Samples were taken 250mm & 1000mm from tip of a leading branch; and also at base of plant with a small core.
displacement mass of whole stem segment when submerged in water
dry mass of whole stem segment
displacement mass of wood (stem with bark removed) when submerged in water
dry mass of wood (stem with bark removed)
